author: luc
msg: moved multistep integrator and step interpolator base classes to their corresponding generic package

author: ate
msg: Fixing hot deploy broken on Java6 because of the outdated version of Xerces used by Jetspeed (in WEB-INF/lib).
Removed all the xerces dependencies AFAIK which could pull in xerces in the portal lib folder.
Only required code change needed in CastorFileSystemDocumentHandler for pretty printing written out psml files.
Solved that by replacing the xerces based XMLSerializer with the dom4J XMLWriter (which doesn't depend on Xerces).
In addition, the Castor Unmarhaller need to be told to *not* try to use Xerces by default, for which an override castor.properties in WEB-INF/classes is needed.
